document.full_text: an american who has admitted scouting targets for the 2008 assault on mumbai by pakistani militants testified on monday that the plot was hatched with at least one pakistani intelligence official and a navy frogman.
document.title: at u.s. trial, pakistan links to mumbai attacks examined
lines_and_colors: an american who has admitted scouting targets for the 2008 assault on mumbai by pakistani militants testified on monday that the plot was hatched with at least one pakistani intelligence official and a navy frogman.
